MetaData.Description: Most APSIM crop or plant modules do not require extra user input. Crop specific parameters are either provided for your chosen soil, or are captured as part of the standard model validation process.

Model.stage_names: sowing germination emergence end_of_juvenile floral_initiation flag_leaf flowering start_grain_fill end_grain_fill maturity harvest_ripe end_crop

pesw_germ.description: plant extractable soil water in seedling layer inadequate for germination (mm/mm)

shoot_lag.description: time lag before linear coleoptile growth starts (deg days)

shoot_rate.description: growing deg day increase with depth for coleoptile (deg day/mm depth)

twilight.description: Twilight is defined as the interval between sunrise or sunset and the time when the true

leaf_no_seed.description: number of leaf primordia present in seed

leaf_init_rate.description: degree days to initiate each leaf primordium until floral init (deg day)

leaf_app_rate1.description: Growing deg day required to develop the most leaf ligules. (deg day).

leaf_app_rate2.description: Growing deg day required to develop last leaf ligules. (deg day).

leaf_no_rate_change.description: Leaf no below flag above which leaf appearance rate changes from rate1 to rate2.

rue.description: g bio/MJ Radn radiation use efficiency

row_spacing_default.description: Default rowing spacing used to calculate k

stem_trans_frac.description: fraction of stem used in translocation to grain

leaf_trans_frac.description: fraction of leaf used in translocation to grain

partition_rate_leaf.description: coefficient of sigmoidal function between leaf partition fraction and internode no**2 (0-1)

frac_stem2flower.description: fraction of dm allocated to stem that goes to developing head

y_lai_sla_max.description: maximum specific leaf area for delta LAI

lai_sla_min.description: minimum specific leaf area for delta LAI

sla_min.description: minimum specific leaf area for new leaf area

tiller_coef.description: exponent for determining leaf area on each additional tiller

x_sw_ratio.description: water availability for effects on root depth growth

y_sw_fac_root.description: stress factor for root depth growth, This may be probably the same for all crops

x_sw_demand_ratio.description: water availability This is the original value

x_sw_avail_ratio.description: water availability Needs to be severe to worry phenology

dm_root_sen_frac.description: fraction of root dry matter senesced each day

sen_light_slope.description: sensitivity of leaf area senescence to shading

x_temp_senescence.description: minimum temperature for frost senescence table (oC)

y_senescence_fac.description: daily fraction of leaf area senesced due to frost (0-1)

sen_rate_water.description: slope in linear eqn relating soil water stress during photosynthesis to leaf senesence rate

dead_detach_frac.description: fraction detached from each part of a dead plant per day.

sen_radn_crit.description: radiation level for onset of light senescence

sen_threshold.description: supply:demand ratio for onset of water senescence

spla_slope.description: regression slope for calculating inflection point for leaf senescence

tt_emerg_limit.description: maximum degree days allowed for emergence to take place

days_germ_limit.description: maximum days allowed after sowing for germination to take place (days)

swdf_photo_limit.description: critical cumulative photosynthesis water stress, above which the crop partly fails (unitless)

swdf_photo_rate.description: rate of plant reduction with photosynthesis water stress

swdf_pheno_limit.description: critical cumulative phenology water stress, above which the crop fails (unitless)

p_uptake_factor.description: factor to calc total P uptake from demand for today's growth

y_p_conc_max_root.description: assume P conc in roots non-varying

kl_ub.description: upper limit of water uptake factor

x_stem_wt.description: look up table for canopy height
look up table for canopy height
look up table for canopy height
look up table for canopy height
look up table for canopy height
look up table for canopy height
look up table for canopy height
look up table for canopy height
look up table for canopy height
look up table for canopy height

variable.name: DeltaGreenN
variable.description: Daily N increase in live plant parts

variable.name: DeltaTTfm
variable.description: Daily thermal time between flowering and maturity

variable.name: GreenN
variable.description: N content of live plant parts

variable.name: GreenP
variable.description: P content of live plant parts

variable.name: PhaseTT
variable.description: Cumulative growing degree days required for each stage

variable.name: SenescedN
variable.description: N content of senesced plant parts

variable.name: SenescedP
variable.description: P content of senesced plant parts

variable.name: StageTT
variable.description: The sum of growing degree days for the current stage

variable.name: TillerNo
variable.description: No of tillers on main stem

variable.name: TillerNoFertile
variable.description: No of tillers that produce a head

variable.name: TotalTT
variable.description: Growing degree days from sowing by stage

variable.name: biomass_n
variable.description: N above ground biomass including grain

variable.name: cep
variable.description: Accumulative water uptake from the whole profile

variable.name: diffusion_supply_tot
variable.description: Accumulative total of crop N supply by diffusion

variable.name: dlt_dm_detached
variable.description: Plant biomass detached from each part

variable.name: dlt_dm_green
variable.description: Plant biomass growth in each part

variable.name: dlt_dm_green_retrans
variable.description: Plant biomass retranslocated from each part

variable.name: dlt_n_retrans
variable.description: N retranslocated from plant parts to grain

variable.name: dlt_p_detached
variable.description: Actual P loss with detached plant

variable.name: dlt_p_green
variable.description: Daily P increase in live plant parts

variable.name: dlt_p_retrans
variable.description: P retranslocated from plant parts to grain

variable.name: ep
variable.description: Water uptake from the whole profile

variable.name: esw_layer
variable.description: Plant extractable soil water in each layer

variable.name: esw_profile
variable.description: Plant extractable water over the whole profile

variable.name: green_biomass_n
variable.description: N in live above ground biomass including grain

variable.name: n_Plant
variable.description: Total Nitrogen in the plant including roots

variable.name: n_diffusion_uptake
variable.description: Today's N uptake by diffusion from soil profile

variable.name: n_massflow_uptake
variable.description: Today's N uptake by massflow from soil profile

variable.name: n_supply_soil
variable.description: Today's total N supply from soil profile

variable.name: n_total_uptake
variable.description: Today's N uptake by mass flow and diffusion

variable.name: nfact_expan
variable.description: Nitrogen stress factor for leaf expansion

variable.name: pfact_expansion
variable.description: Phosphorus stress factor for leaf expansion

variable.name: stover_n
variable.description: N above ground biomass excluding grain

variable.name: sw_deficit
variable.description: Soil water deficit below dul (dul - sw)

variable.name: sw_supply
variable.description: Daily soil water supply over the profile

variable.name: sw_supply_sum
variable.description: Accumulative soil water supply over the profile

variable.name: sw_uptake
variable.description: Daily water uptake in each different rooted layers

variable.name: swdef_expan
variable.description: Water stress factor for leaf expansion growth

variable.name: transpiration
variable.description: Daily water uptake from all rooted soil layers

variable.name: transpiration_tot
variable.description: Accumulative water uptake from the whole profile
